assertions.assertion: Pass in an invalid ResourceID. saHpiAutoExtractTimeoutGet() returns SA_ERR_HPI_INVALID_RESOURCE.
Pass in an invalid SessionID. saHpiAutoExtractTimeoutGet() returns SA_ERR_HPI_INVALID_SESSION.
Obtain the AutoExtractTimeout for all resources. saHpiAutoExtractTimeoutGet() returns SA_OK.
Call on a resource which does not support Managed Hot Swap. saHpiAutoExtractTimeoutGet() returns SA_ERR_HPI_CAPABILITY.
Pass in a NULL pointer for Timeout. saHpiAutoExtractTimeoutGet() returns SA_ERR_HPI_INVALID_PARAMS.
